nodes.text: Fere, sometimes known as Feree, was the Fere homeworld.

The planet of Fere was famed for its shipyards, and produced some of the most luxurious starships of the age. In about 192 BBY, the Fere populace and culture were still stable however the species later died out due to a planet-wide plague. The plague was brought to the planet by off-world traveler's searching for somewhere to hide during a war.
